name: Content Structure Guidelines
description: Ensures well-organized, readable content with clear structure
guidance:
**Content Structure Guidelines:**
- Use clear headings and subheadings (## and ###)
- Organize content in logical sections
- Include bullet points or numbered lists for clarity
- Provide examples when explaining concepts
- Maintain consistent tone and style
- Ensure smooth transitions between sections
- Include a summary or conclusion when appropriate
